author: Brian Barrett
title: Turn Off Your Screen Time Notifications
description: It's just one more thing to feel bad about at a time when nothing feels particularly good.
content: Hello, hi. Its been a rough few weeks. The new coronavirus continues to spread. Record numbers of people are filing for unemployment. Youre cooped up at home, maybe with kids. Nothing will make any of this easy. But theres one small way you can give yourself … [+2371 chars]
